title: I cannot make or receive calls on my Google Pixel phone (The very first version).
content:
I cannot make or receive calls on my Google Pixel phone (The very first version).  Everything else works fine. Can send/receive messages, play videos, etc.
This issue started about 10 days ago. Initially by restarting the phone I was able to make a call. Now even that wouldn't help.
I even got a new SIM from my carrier, but still the same.
I have used this phone for nearly four years and I am quite happy with it, so I don't want to go for a new phone if I can resolve this issue.
Could someone help?
Thanks.
